detail_desc: Loafers in imitation suede made partly from recycled polyester. Linings and insoles in a cotton weave. Patterned soles.
Loafers in imitation suede made partly from recycled polyester. Linings and insoles in a cotton weave. Patterned soles.

Cargo trousers in a cotton weave with a regular, elasticated waist, side pockets, flap leg pockets with a concealed hook and loop fastening and fake back pockets with a flap. Tapered legs with elasticated hems.

Ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with hole-patterned details. High waist with a wide, ribbed waistband. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Short, fitted vest top in a soft rib knit with a round neckline.

T-shirt in a linen and cotton blend with a round neckline, open chest pocket and short slits in the sides.

Suit trousers in linen with a regular waist, zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, and an adjustable tab and buttons at the sides. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button, and tapered legs with creases.
Suit trousers in a linen and cotton weave with a regular waist, zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and flap back pockets with a button. Slim, tapered legs with creases.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with flatlock seams. Wrapover front with press-studs at the sides and crotch.

Jacket in cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front and at the cuffs, flap chest pockets with a button and diagonal welt pockets at the bottom. Yoke at the top and a tab with adjustable buttoning at the sides.
Sleeveless dress in airy chiffon with narrow shoulder straps and a racer back. Elasticated seam at the waist and a gently flared, asymmetric skirt. Jersey lining.

Blouse in a crêpe weave with plastic pearly beads around the neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam under the bust and 3/4-length trumpet sleeves. Unlined.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in a crinkled weave with a sheen. Narrow cut at the top with short, narrow shoulder straps, a concealed zip at the back, seam at the waist and straight, calf-length legs. Jersey lining.
A-line dress in airy, patterned chiffon with wide flounces that run diagonally across the skirt. Square neckline and shoulder straps with a decorative bow at the top. Jersey lining.
Hat in braided paper straw with a grosgrain band that has a bow at the back. Width of brim. 5.5 cm.
Hat in braided paper straw with a grosgrain band that has a bow at the back. Width of brim. 5.5 cm.

One-shoulder dress in plumeti chiffon with a glittery thread pattern. Two flounces at the top, one shoulder strap with a decorative bow, an elasticated seam at the waist and a flared skirt with a flounced hem. Jersey lining.

One-shoulder dress in plumeti chiffon with a glittery thread pattern. Two flounces at the top, one shoulder strap with a decorative bow, an elasticated seam at the waist and a flared skirt with a flounced hem. Jersey lining.
Short-sleeved shirt in washed linen with a resort collar, French front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Straight fit with a gently rounded hem.

Calf-length jumpsuit in an airy, patterned viscose weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and short, flounce-trimmed sleeves. Narrow, elasticated seam and a sewn-on tie belt at the waist, diagonal side pockets and straight legs.

Calf-length jumpsuit in an airy, patterned viscose weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and short, flounce-trimmed sleeves. Narrow, elasticated seam and a sewn-on tie belt at the waist, diagonal side pockets and straight legs.
Sleeveless, A-line dress in an airy, patterned cotton weave with narrow shoulder straps, elastication at the top of the back and gathered tiers to create width. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in softly draping satin with a concealed zip at the back and a wrapover V-neck at the front with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Long raglan sleeves and wide cuffs with covered buttons. Seam at the waist and a skirt with pleats at the top to create soft draping. Unlined.
Blouse in a crinkled weave with a sheen. Small, frill-trimmed stand-up collar and a smocked yoke. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with smocking at the cuffs, and covered elastication at the hem.
Blouse in a crinkled weave with a sheen. Small, frill-trimmed stand-up collar and a smocked yoke. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with smocking at the cuffs, and covered elastication at the hem.
Fitted, calf-length dress in sturdy, ribbed jersey with a slight sheen. High collar, long ties at the waist, a wrapover and open section at the back, and slits in the sides. Lined.
Fitted, calf-length dress in sturdy, ribbed jersey with a slight sheen. High collar, long ties at the waist, a wrapover and open section at the back, and slits in the sides. Lined.

Sleeveless body in airy jersey with cut-out sections at the back. Narrow cut at the top with gathers at the front, and a decorative drawstring at the back with ties at the back of the neck. Seam at the hips and a lower section in softer jersey with press-studs at the crotch.

Sleeveless body in airy jersey with cut-out sections at the back. Narrow cut at the top with gathers at the front, and a decorative drawstring at the back with ties at the back of the neck. Seam at the hips and a lower section in softer jersey with press-studs at the crotch.

Short, wide dress in patterned chiffon with a mandarin collar, opening at the top and ties at the neckline. Gathered yoke at the back, long puff sleeves and cuffs with covered buttons. Gathered seam at the waist and a gathered seam at the hem with a wide flounce. Satin lining.

Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a sheen. Opening at the top and a stand-up collar with ties at the front. Long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Lined.

Calf-length satin dress with a V-neck and wrapover front with narrow ties that fasten at one side. Long balloon sleeves with a narrow trim and covered button at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and a flared, pleated skirt. Lined.

Cycling shorts in jersey with a slight sheen. Wide ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Fitted jacket in fleece jersey designed to be worn as a thermal mid layer. Hood, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and thumbholes at the cuffs. Unlined.

High-waisted, ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with inset mesh sections at the hems. Wide waist panel containing a concealed key pocket.
Cycling shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with a sculpting effect on the tummy, hips and legs. High waist with a wide, scalloped waist panel.
Sports trousers in a sturdy cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist. Side pockets with a taped zip, flap back pockets and gently tapered legs with elastic detailing at the hems.

Jacket in water-repellent functional fabric with mesh inside. High collar, a hood with an elastic drawstring, and zip and wind flap with a hook and loop fastening down the front. Yoke at the back, flap chest pockets and zipped side pockets. Long sleeves with an adjustable tab and hook and loop fastening at the cuffs, ventilating holes with metal eyelets under the arms, and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Cardigan in soft, textured-knit organic cotton with a round neck and buttons down the front. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
